Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its high quality and unique features, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $950,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen in business investments. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
